name: Otherlands
description:
Otherlands is a survival co-op/multiplayer VR exclusive where you crash-land on a planet and must build a space-ship to get back to your queer lover and to continue to explore the infinite universe.

"Minecraft meets Kerbel Space Program meets No Mans Sky with a queer romance story"

This is a live development build for testers. Anyone is free to sign-up to be a tester :-)

<blink>Screenshots are from the original Unreal build -- We're currently switching over to a custom Rust/Vulkan/OpenXR engine but it's in an extreme alpha state. The download link refers to the newer custom engine.</blink>
